Service - Enhansive Swapping

8
Sabotage
Saturday, October 14th, 2017, 7:39:37 PM

Like Bazzlewyn's script swapping but for enhansives. Has to be the same slot. Can be swapped to item with or without enhansives already. If the piece has enhansives already you can overwrite them or add to it, but to maximum of 2 slots. The item would have the charges of the swapped enhansive, not what was already on the item.

Maybe this service already exists but I can't remember seeing it.

@Wyrom @Estild

Wyrom
Saturday, October 14th, 2017, 7:59:05 PM

We've done it. It's a very intensive service. Only a small handful of GMs know how to do it.

I was just thinking that with an influx of a lot of enhansives that people might not want to go through having to L/D then alter the items again. When you could just add the enhansive to the item you already have.

@Wyrom Also enhansive adding. Adding +1 bonus to enhansives. Either adding to an existing enhansive or adding to an item without it.
